subject: BeforeClass and inheritance
msgSnippet: I have an abstract base class that defines a static @BeforeClass setUp method. When this class is extended, the static setUp method is not called. The javadoc
messageBody: I have an abstract base class that defines a static @BeforeClass setUp method. When this class is extended, the static setUp method is not called. The javadoc says it will call a super class's @BeforeClass before the current class's. Am I missing something?
